official_title: To establish a National commission on Choices in Health Care Reform.
short_title: National Commission on Choices in Health Care Reform Act of 1990

summary.text: National Commission on Choices in Health Care Reform Act of 1990 - Establishes a National Commission on Choices in Health Care Reform to: (1) examine the health care systems of countries, including Canada, Japan, and Germany; (2) prepare legislative proposals for a U.S. national system; and (3) evaluate the extent to which each such proposal serves system objectives described in this Act. Terminates the Commission after submission of its report. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Commission on Choices in Health Care Reform Act of 1990
To establish a National commission on Choices in Health Care Reform.
